meanings.definition: The quality of being eager or willing to engage in a particular activity or pursuit.
meanings.sent1: Her gameness to learn new things impressed her teacher.
meanings.sent2: His gameness to help others made him a valuable team member.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's gameness to chase its tail never failed to bring a smile.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's gameness to push through pain inspired the team.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's gameness to face challenges led to great discoveries.

meanings.definition: The quality of being spirited or plucky, especially in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's gameness in battle earned him respect from his comrades.
meanings.sent2: Her gameness in the competition showed her true strength of character.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's gameness to take on the big dog was both brave and foolish.
meanings.sent4: The firefighter's gameness to enter the burning building saved lives.
meanings.sent5: The child's gameness to stand up to the bully inspired others to do the same.
